level.heading: Established.
level.text: There is hereby established a Commission on Latino Community Development to advise the Mayor, the Director of the Office on Latino Affairs, the Council, and the public concerning the views and needs of the Latino community in the District of Columbia.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-86, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-1301.
For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-42, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-1311.
